title: SSL Certificate Weak Cipher
description: SSL/TLS certificate uses weak cipher suites vulnerable to man-in-the-middle attacks
synopsis: The remote SSL/TLS certificate supports weak cipher suites that may allow for decryption of sensitive traffic.
solution: Update SSL/TLS configuration to disable weak ciphers and enable only strong encryption suites.

title: SQL Injection in Login Form
description: SQL injection vulnerability discovered in application login form allows unauthorized database access
synopsis: SQL injection vulnerability found in login form parameter 'username' allowing database enumeration.
solution: Implement parameterized queries and input validation to prevent SQL injection attacks.

title: Outdated Apache Version
description: Apache web server running outdated version with known vulnerabilities
synopsis: Apache version 2.4.29 is outdated and contains multiple security vulnerabilities.
solution: Upgrade Apache to latest stable version (2.4.58 or later).

title: Missing Security Headers
description: Missing HTTP security headers expose application to clickjacking and other attacks
column10: HSTS) are missing from web server responses.
column11: Configure security headers in web server configuration to prevent client-side attacks.
